title: MainConcept TotalCode Studio 3.1.0 (cracked VR) [ChingLiu]

TotalCode Studio can help post-production studios, small content preparation houses, broadcasters, and non-linear editors succeed with efficient workflows and stunning video quality.

 A plug-in based application that incorporates MainConcept's codecs into a single desktop application, TotalCode Studio is practical, efficient and cost effective. Due to its many ready-to-use presets and multi-purpose advanced encoder settings, TotalCode Studio enables you to convert your video and audio into numerous formats including some of the latest standards, such as HEVC and Ultra HD 4K, so it can be used in almost any professional market segment Ã¢â‚¬â€œ from content producers and consumer electronics manufacturers to broadcast and OTT content preparation.

 Many powerful features, such as watch folder automation, batch list encoding, as well as audio and video filters Ã¢â‚¬â€œ color correction, timecode insertion, and audio normalization Ã¢â‚¬â€œ make TotalCode Studio an ideal tool for production environments requiring professional quality and performance.

Features

Support for Popular Delivery Formats - Export multiplexed files using a wide range of popular formats including H.264/AVC, QuickTime (for Apple iPad and iPhone), Adobe Flash, 3GP (H.263, H.264, MPEG-4), HTML5, DVB, and DivXÃ‚Â®.

Watch Folder Automation - Configure folders with predefined encoding parameters and leave TotalCode to automatically process incoming media whenever it is added.

Built-in Video and Audio Processing - Adjust source files with color correction, timecode insertion, audio normalization, video scaling, and frame and sample rate conversion.

Scalable Codec Support - Add more advanced video and audio codecs (e.g., JPEG2000, and DTSÃ‚Â®) as needed, through seamless upgrades that utilize the same familiar TotalCode Studio encoding interface.

Batch List Encoding - Execute multiple tasks efficiently by setting up a batch process for files that use specified encoding presets and output formats.

Built-in Video and Audio Processing - Adjust source files with color correction, timecode insertion, logo burn-in, image flipping, image cropping, audio normalization, video scaling, and frame and sample rate conversion.

TotalCode Preset Exchange -Create custom presets in TotalCode Studio and exchange presets between TotalCode Studio and TotalCode Enterprise
